SA14bsa031_u:631_1: viśeṣaviśiṣṭadharmādhigamaśca bodhisattvena parijñeyo na sarvākārajñāneneti pratyekabuddhamārgaḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:632: nirvedhabhāgīyādhigame sati yathoktamārga utpadyata iti nirvedhabhāgīyamāha -
SA14bsa031_u:645_1: ceti catvāraḥ kṣāntijñānakṣaṇāḥ pratyekaṃ duḥkhādisatyasambandhayuktā aihikāmutrikairguṇairyuktā
SA14bsa031_u:657: paramārthataḥ tathatābuddhayorādhārādheyabhāvo na vidyata ityatastayoḥ paryāyeṇāvasthiterananujñānam /
SA14bsa031_u:670: buddhatvābhilāṣiṇā svayaṃ prāṇātipātaviratyādipūrvakaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthitvā tatraiva pareṣāṃ sthāpanam /
SA14bsa031_u:671: dānādīnāmakṣayaṃ kartumicchatā samyaksambodhau pariṇāmanamityevaṃ mārgasatyasyākārā bhavanti /
SA14bsa031_u:673: kecidiha kārikārthopalakṣaṇapareṇa granthena ākārārthamanuktvā darśanamārgaṣoḍaśakṣaṇopalakṣaṇameva kevalamanukṛtamiti varṇayanti,
SA14bsa031_u:676: 'ālambanamanityādi satyādhāraṃ tadākṛtiḥ' ityādikārikārthaśca kathaṃ vyākhyeya ityapare /
SA14bsa031_u:678: darśanamārgānantaraṃ bhāvanāmārgābhidhāne sati svalpavaktatvena phalanimnatvena ca vineyapravṛtteḥ tatkāritraṃ tāvat -
SA14bsa031_u:696: iti / svobhayaparārthopalambhatayā yathādhimokṣaṃ dṛṣṭakuśaladharmadhiṣṭhānā bhāvanāmārgādhikārādādau asākṣātkriyārūpādhimuktiḥ trividhā satī pratyekaṃ mṛdvādibhedena trividhā /
SA14bsa031_u:700: tadbhāvakabodhisattvasyotsāhavardhanāya tadadhimokṣasya styutyādayo buddhādibhiḥ kriyanta iti stutiṃ,
SA14bsa031_u:702: stutiḥ stobhaḥ praśaṃsā ca prajñāpāramitāṃ prati /
SA14bsa031_u:735: sa ca dvividha iti prathamamabhinirhāralakṣaṇaṃ bhāvanāmārgamāha -
SA14bsa031_u:743: 11 - atyantaviśuddhiḥ tadanantaraṃ yaḥ parigrahatyāgena prāpsyamānaḥ kastasyotpādānutpādaheturiti ākāṃkṣānirāsadvāreṇa dvitīyamatyantaviśuddhilakṣaṇamāha -
SA14bsa031_u:758: iti / āryapudgalasya yat śrāmaṇyatāphalaṃ tasya sarvavipakṣarahitatvena yā viśuddhiḥ saiva rūpādiviśuddhiḥ,
SA14bsa031_u:760: prabhedatvena yasmāt tadviśuddhiḥ abhinnā acchinnā tasmāt svasāmānyalakṣaṇanānātvavirahād evaṃ viśuddhirabhidhīyate /
SA14bsa031_u:768: mārgajñatādhikāre viśuddikathanaprasaṅgādātyantikī cetarā ca buddhānāṃ śrāvakādīnāṃ ca yathākramaṃ viśuddhiḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:772: iti / kāradhātudhyānārūpyasamāpattaya iti navabhūmiṣvadhimātrādinavaprakāravipakṣasya pratipakṣabhāvena mṛdumṛdvādimārgo yathākramaṃ navaprakāraḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:773: sarvathānyathā ca viśuddhihetutvādātyantikī cetarā ca viśuddhiriti /
SA14bsa031_u:776: mārgasya ceṣyate tasya codyasya parihārataḥ // Abhis_2.31 //
SA14bsa031_u:777_0: iti / tatrādhimātrādhimātrādiḥ pratipakṣo mṛdumṛdvādirvipakṣa iti bhavitavyamiticodyasya
SA14bsa031_u:778: traidhātukākārajñānajñeyānupalambhād yā samatā saiva samastapratipakṣatvādātyantikī viśuddhirbuddhasya vyavasthāpyata iti //
SA14bsa031_u:784: sarvavastuparijñānaṃ vinā na mārgajñatāparijñānaṃ samyag iti sarvajñatāmāha -
SA14bsa031_u:785: nāpare na pare tīre nāntarāle tayoḥ sthitā /
SA14bsa031_u:787: iti / traiyadhvikadharmāṇāmanutpādākāreṇa tulyatāvabodhāt buddhabodhisattvānāṃ yā āsannībhūtā matā prajñāpāramitā,
SA14bsa031_u:788: sā khalu prajñayā punarnāpare tīre saṃsāre,
SA14bsa031_u:789: na pare tīre nirvāṇe ca yathākramaṃ śāśvatocchedalakṣaṇe,
SA14bsa031_u:790: na tayormadhye 'pi vyavasthiteti na saṃsāranirvāṇayoḥ vyavasthitā /
SA14bsa031_u:793: sarvajñatādhikārād vyatirekanirdeśena śrāvakādīnāṃ tryadhvasamatājñānābhāvāt samyak prajñāpāramitā dūrībhūteti /
SA14bsa031_u:794: svādhigamamātrātmikā tu prajñāpāramitā kṛpāprajñāvaikalyānnirvāṇe saṃsāre cāvasthitā vastvastūpalambhatayeti jñeyā /
SA14bsa031_u:795: 'yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatā saiva te matā' iti nyāyādadhvatrayasamatājñānaṃ padārthāvabodha eva,
SA14bsa031_u:796: nanu sa ca sarveṣāmeva samastīti kathaṃ śrāvakabodhisattvādīnāṃ samyak prajñāpāramitādūrībhāvaḥ,
SA14bsa031_u:800_0: iti / māyākāranirmitavastunaḥ pratibhāse aviditatatsvarūpasya bhāvābhiniveśitā naiḥsvābhāvyāpratibhāsa
SA14bsa031_u:800_1: iva kalyāṇamitrādyupāyakauśalavaikalyād vastu nimittayogena pratipattau tatsamatāparijñānamavijñātabhāvarūpāṇāṃ
SA14bsa031_u:807: iti / sarveṣāṃ rūpādīnāṃ traiyadhvikānāñca dharmāṇāṃ sāsravānāsravobhayasthānīyānāmanupalambhasvarūpāṇāṃ sarvatra bhāvopalambhatayā te paraparikalpitātmādiśūnyatvena dṛṣṭāḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:808: anuṣṭhānasaṃjñā tu eteṣāṃ pratipakṣabhūtāni viparyāsapravṛttatvena heyatvāt vipakṣo bhavati /
SA14bsa031_u:813: iti / trimaṇḍalaviśuddhyā dānādāvanātmāvabodhena svaparayorniyojanaṃ samyak pravṛttatvāt sarvasaktinicayasthānapratiṣedhena copādeyatvāt sarvathā pratipakṣaḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:814: tathāgatādiṣu namaskārādiḥ puṇyasambhārahetutvena pratipakṣo 'pi san sūkṣmasaktirūpatayā na sarvathā pratipakṣa iti vipakṣo bhavati /
SA14bsa031_u:817: iti / yasmāt svabhāvenaiva dharmagotrāṇāṃ śūnyatvāt teṣāṃ gāmbhīryam,
SA14bsa031_u:821: iti / rūpādisarvadharmāṇāmekaiva prakṛtiḥ yaduta niḥsvabhāva iti jñānajñeyasamataikaparijñāne saktirvarjitā bhavati /
SA14bsa031_u:824: iti / yasmāt sarvavijñānopalavdhārthanirākaraṇena tasyāḥ prakṛterdurbodhatā kathitā,
SA14bsa031_u:831: evaṃ kṛtvā yathokto vai jñeyaḥ sarvajñatānate /
SA14bsa031_u:833: iti / sarvajñatādhikāre yathoktanayena yathākramaṃ śrāvakabodhisattvādīnāṃ vipakṣapratipakṣayorayaṃ prabhedo 'vasātavyaḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:835: vipakṣādi evamabhidhāya tayorvibhāvanāyāṃ kaḥ prayoga iti cet prayogamāha -
SA14bsa031_u:838: avikāro na karttā ca prayogo duṣkarastridhā /
SA14bsa031_u:854: samatādvāreṇa prayogo bhāvanīya iti prayogānantaraṃ samatāmāha -
SA14bsa031_u:855: caturdhā 'mananā tasya rūpādau samatā matā // Abhis_3.10 //
SA14bsa031_u:858: prayogasamatāṃ pratividhya darśanamārgo bhāvanīya iti darśanamārgamāha -
SA14bsa031_u:861: iti / pratisatyaṃ dharmajñānakṣāntirdharmajñānamanvayajñānakṣāntiranvayajñānamityevaṃ ṣoḍaśakṣaṇātmakaḥ sarvajñatādhikāre darśanamārgo bhavati /
SA14bsa031_u:866: pravyāhāreṇa nāsyārthaḥ pareṣu prāptaye yataḥ // Abhis_3.13 //
SA14bsa031_u:874: ātmānātmasvabhāvābhāvānnotpannaṃ na niruddhaṃ na saṃkliṣṭaṃ na vyavadātamityādayo duḥkhasatyākārā bhavanti /
SA14bsa031_u:887: nairyāṇikānairyāṇikavikalpatvenobhaye vācyavācakabhāvalakṣaṇe jñeye śabde jñānasyānutpattiriti mārgasatyākārā bhavanti /
SA14bsa031_u:888: evamete ākārāḥ sarvajñatākṣaṇā iti bodhisattvānāṃ darśamārgaḥ,
SA14bsa031_u:890: śrāvakamārgo bodhisattvena parijñātavyo na sākṣātkaraṇīya iti bhāvanāmārgo na nirdiṣṭaḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:892: iti seyaṃ punaḥ seyaṃ khalu punastridhā /
SA14bsa031_u:896: iyaṃ sarvajñatā cetyevaṃ parivartatrayeṇa prakāratrayaṃ parisamāptam /
SA14bsa031_u:901: parijñātatrisarvajñatāvaśitvārthaṃ punaḥ sarvākāramārgavastujñānasaṅgraheṇa trisarvajñatāṃ bhāvayatīti sarvākārābhisambodha ityāha -
SA14bsa031_u:903: sarvajñatānāṃ traividhyāt trividhā eva te matāḥ // Abhis_4.1 //
SA14bsa031_u:908: catvāraḥ pratisatyaṃ te mārge pañcadaśa smṛtāḥ // Abhis_4.2 //
SA14bsa031_u:909_1: iti dvādaśa ākārā hi yathākramaṃ duḥkhādisatyatrayasya anityādilakṣaṇā bhavanti /
SA14bsa031_u:911: sarvajñatayā pratyekabuddhāḥ saṅgṛhītā iti teṣāṃ jñeyāvaraṇapratipakṣatvena dvau sāsravānāsravabhāvanāmārgau ceti mārgāḥ triprakārāḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:912: tatra prathame akārakājānakāsaṃkrāntyavinayākārā iti catvāro yathākramaṃ mārgādilakṣaṇāḥ (kleśāvaraṇapratipakṣe) bhavanti /
SA14bsa031_u:918: hetau mārge ca duḥkhe ca nirodho ca yathākramam /
SA14bsa031_u:919: aṣṭau te sapta pañceti ṣoḍaśeti ca kīrtitāḥ // Abhis_4.3 //
SA14bsa031_u:921: duḥkhanirodhasatye ca phalamityarthadvāreṇa nirdiṣṭe samudayamārgaduḥkhanirodhasatyeṣu yathāsaṃkhyamaṣṭādyākārā boddhavyāḥ //
SA14bsa031_u:922: tatra virāga-asamutthāna-śānta-arāga-adveṣa-amoha-niḥkleśa-niḥsattvākārā eva yathākramaṃ yo hetuḥ chando rāgo nandī ca,
SA14bsa031_u:925: yaśca pratyayaḥ sattvābhiniveśa iti eteṣāṃ pratipakṣabhūtatvena trayastraya eka eka ityaṣṭāvākārāḥ samudayasatye bhavanti /
SA14bsa031_u:926: apramāṇa-antadvayānanugama-asambhinna-aparāmṛṣṭa-avikalpa-aprameya-asaṅgākārā-yathākramaṃ yaḥ sarvasattvāvakāśado mārgaḥ yathā va sarvasattvāvakāśadaḥ,
SA14bsa031_u:929: yacca niryāṇamiti tatsvabhāvā dvau dvau dvāveka iti saptākārā mārgasatye bhavanti /
SA14bsa031_u:930: anitya-duḥkha-śūnya-anātmākārāḥ pañcamālakṣaṇākārasvabhāvā ityevaṃ pañcākārā duḥkhasatye bhavanti /
SA14bsa031_u:935: svabhāvanirodhena abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatākāra ekaḥ niḥsaraṇākārātmaka ityevaṃ ṣoḍaśākārā nirodhasatye bhavanti /
SA14bsa031_u:939: śiṣyāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ buddhānāṃ ca yathākramam // Abhis_4.4 //
SA14bsa031_u:942: smṛtyupasthānamārabhya buddhākāraparyantānāṃ hi trisarvajñatāsaṅgṛhītamārgadvāreṇa sarvākārajñatayā sarveṣāmāryapudgalānāṃ saṅgrahaṇena ca yathāsaṃkhyaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ saptatriṃśat,
SA14bsa031_u:946: tato 'vatīrṇasya vīryamiti utpannānutpannasya akuśalasya kuśalasya ca yathākramaṃ samyakprahāṇānutpādanārthaṃ vardhana (bhūyobhāva)
SA14bsa031_u:949: kṛtacittaparikarmaṇo 'nantaramūṣmamūrdhaprayogaḥ iti ūṣmamūrdhasvabhāvāḥ śraddhāvīryasmṛtisamādhiprajñendriyākārāḥ pañca samyagabhisamayaprāyogikamārgaḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:950: adhigatoṣmādeḥ kṣāntyagradharmaprayoga iti kṣāntyagradharmasvabhāvāḥ śraddhāvīryasmṛtisamādhiprajñābalākārāḥ pañca abhisamayasaṃśleṣamārgaḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:952_1: viśuddhanairyāṇikamārga iti śiṣyāṇāṃ sarvajñatāmārgādhiṣṭhānāḥ saptatriṃśadākārā bhavanti /
SA14bsa031_u:955: traidhātukapraṇidhānapratipakṣaḥ iti tatsvabhāvā yathākramaṃ śūnyānātmākārasvabhāvaṃ prathamaṃ vimokṣamukham,
SA14bsa031_u:958: avibhāvitavibhāvitarūpasaṃjñatvād yathākramamadhyātmaṃ rūpyarūpīti bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyatītyetau nirmāṇāvaraṇapratipakṣeṇa dvau vimokṣau /
SA14bsa031_u:959_0: śubhāśubharūpanirmāṇe ca yathākramamābhogaḥ prātikūlyañca saṃkleśaḥ tatpratipakṣeṇa
SA14bsa031_u:959_1: śubhaṃ vimokṣamukhaṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasampadya viharatītyeko vimokṣa iti vimokṣākārāḥ
SA14bsa031_u:960: mokṣānukūlavihāramārgasvabhāvāścaturārūpyasamāpattyākārāḥ śāntavihārasvabhāvaḥ saṃjñāveditanirodhākāra eka iti pañcākārā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāramārgaḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:967: buddho 'hamityātmapratijñāne rāgādīnāmantarāyatvākhyāne sarvajñatādimārgasya niryāṇatvaprakāśane kṣīṇāsravatvenātmano 'bhyupagame ca paryanuyokturabhāvena vaiśāradyākārāścatvāraḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:968: paryāye dharmalakṣaṇe janapadabhāṣāyāṃ dharmaprabhede ca yathākramaṃ dharmārthaniruktipratibhānapratisaṃvidākārāścatvāraḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:969: nāsti skhalitaḥ ravitaṃ muṣitasmṛtirasamāhitaṃ cittaṃ nānātvasaṃjñā apratisaṃkhyāyopekṣā cetyevamākārāḥ ṣaṭ /
SA14bsa031_u:970: nāstichandato vīryataḥ smṛtitaḥ samādheḥ prajñāyāḥ vimukteśca parihāṇirityevamākārāḥ ṣaṭ /
SA14bsa031_u:978: anāsravā eva sarvākārajñatākārāḥ sarvathā savāsanasarvakleśajñeyāvaraṇaprahāṇena samyaksambuddhasya sarvadharmavaśavartitvād,
SA14bsa031_u:981: te ca prayoktāraṃ vinā kathayitumaśakyā iti śravaṇādibhājanaṃ prayoktāramāha -
SA14bsa031_u:990: kalyāṇamitrairadhiṣṭhitāśca yathākramamākāralakṣaṇāyā māturasyā granthaśravaṇadhāraṇāmuṣitārthayathānayamanaskārāṇāṃ bhājanaṃ buddhādibhiḥ matamiti /
SA14bsa031_u:1000: phalaratnapradātā ca śuddhakaḥ sāvadhiśca saḥ // Abhis_4.11 //
SA14bsa031_u:1008: prayogānantaraṃ guṇadarśanapūrvakaṃ sutarāmabhyasyante prayogā iti tadguṇān āha -
SA14bsa031_u:1010_4: ityetadaviparītaprayogānumodanāt caturdaśa guṇā utpadyante prāpyante ca /
SA14bsa031_u:1013: yeṣāṃ parivarjanena prayogā bhāvayitavyā ityantarāyakarān doṣānāha -
SA14bsa031_u:1063: doṣānantaraṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ guṇadoṣādānatyāgena prayogā bhāvanīyā lakṣaṇajñāna pūrvakamiti teṣāṃ lakṣaṇamāha -
SA14bsa031_u:1064: lakṣyate yena tajjñeyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ trividhaṃ ca tat /
SA14bsa031_u:1065: jñānaṃ viśeṣa kāritraṃ svabhāvo yaśca lakṣyate // Abhis_4.13 //
SA14bsa031_u:1067: karmasādhanaparigraheṇa ca svabhāvātmakamiti lakṣaṇaṃ caturvidhaṃ boddhavyam /
SA14bsa031_u:1068: tatra tāvat jñānalakṣaṇaṃ trisarvajñatābhedena bhidyamānaṃ sarvajñatādvāreṇāha -
SA14bsa031_u:1077_1: ṣoḍaśabhiḥ jñānākāraprakāraiḥ yathānayaṃ sarvajñatāprayogāḥ samyag lakṣyanta iti
SA14bsa031_u:1085: dharmatā 'vikopanāsaṃskārāvikalpaprabhedālakṣaṇāni cetyebhiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ jñānākāraprakāraiḥ yathāvat mārgajñatāprayogā lakṣyanta iti jñānalakṣaṇaṃ mārgajñatāsaṅgṛhītam /
SA14bsa031_u:1093_1: ebhiḥ ṣoḍaśabhirjñānākāraprakāraiḥ yathāvat sarvākārajñatāprayogā lakṣyanta iti jñānalakṣaṇaṃ
SA14bsa031_u:1094: navabhirantaraślokairevaṃ jñānalakṣaṇamabhidhāya jñānākāreṇa paricchinnānāṃ viśeṣo jñeya iti jñānalakṣaṇānantaram antaraślokena viśeṣalakṣaṇamāha -
SA14bsa031_u:1120: abhiniveśānāsvāda iti ṣoḍaśātmakaḥ yathākramaṃ duḥkhādisatyakṣaṇānāṃ viśeṣaḥ,
SA14bsa031_u:1121: yena śrāvakādimārgebhyo bodhisattvādīnāṃ mārgajñatādidvaye viśeṣamārgo viśiṣyate /
SA14bsa031_u:1124: hitaṃ sukhaṃ ca trāṇaṃ ca śaraṇaṃ layanaṃ nṛṇām /
SA14bsa031_u:1125: parāyaṇa ca dvīpaṃ ca pariṇāyakasaṃjñakam // Abhis_4.27 //
SA14bsa031_u:1131: kāritrākārairevaṃ yathāvad sarvajñatātrayasya prayogā lakṣyanta iti kāritralakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa031_u:1132: kāritralakṣaṇenāvacchinnānāṃ kaḥ svabhāva iti antaraślokatrayeṇa svabhāvalakṣaṇamāha -
SA14bsa031_u:1138: lakṣīva lakṣyate ceti caturthaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ matam // Abhis_4.31 //
SA14bsa031_u:1147: bhāvābhāvādisvabhāvatrayānupalambha iti ete sarvākārajñatāyāḥ sapta svabhāvāḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:1148: ityevaṃ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ svabhāvairyathāvat trisarvajñatāprayogā lakṣīva lakṣyante iti caturthaṃ svabhāvalakṣaṇaṃ matam /
SA14bsa031_u:1149: ityevaṃ sāmānyena ekatra kṛtāni ekanavatiḥ lakṣaṇāni bhavanti /
SA14bsa031_u:1154: iti / animittālambanajñānākāreṇa dānādipāramitā ārabhya sarvākārajñatāparyantaṃ svasantāne samudāgame kauśalamevāsmin sarvākārābhisambodhe mokṣabhāgīyamiṣṭam /
SA14bsa031_u:1160: iti / anindriyasvabhāvāḥ śraddhāvīryasmṛtisamādhiviśiṣṭaprajñāḥ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ buddha-dāna-āśayasampatti-avikalpa-sarvadharmasarvākāraparijñādiṣu pañcavidhaviṣayeṣu kauśalam /
SA14bsa031_u:1174: saṃkṣepato 'kuśalakuśalayoryathāsaṃkhyaṃ hānopādānābhyāṃ svayaṃ nivṛttasya pravṛttasya ca,
SA14bsa031_u:1175: taddvārā anyeṣāṃ pāpānnivartanaṃ kuśale ca pravartanamiti dvāvākārau /
SA14bsa031_u:1176: tathaiva anyeṣāṃ svayampravṛttau varṇavādo 'nukūlatā ceti dharmaprabhedadvaividhyena hi anantākārā iti sattvālambane mūrdhagato bhavati /
SA14bsa031_u:1179: pūrvavat svaparādhiṣṭhānapācanamocanādyākāraiḥ sattvālambanameva agradharmā bhavantītyevaṃ nirvedhabhāgīyā bhavanti /
SA14bsa031_u:1185: ye bodhisattvā vartante so 'trāvaivartiko gaṇaḥ // Abhis_4.38 //
SA14bsa031_u:1186: iti / ye vīrāḥ caturṣu nirvedhabhāgīyeṣu vakṣyamāṇadarśanamārgabhāvanāmārgayoḥ tattadadhigamanayena sthitāḥ,
SA14bsa031_u:1188: kiñca teṣāmāveṇikalakṣaṇamiti cet tāvadekena antaraślokena nirvedhabhāgīyasthitānāṃ lakṣaṇamāha -
SA14bsa031_u:1192: kāni ca nivṛttyāderlakṣaṇāni iti cet ṣaḍbhiḥ antaraślokaiḥ pratipādayitumāha -
SA14bsa031_u:1202: māra ityeva bodhaśca caryā buddhānumoditā // Abhis_4.44 //
SA14bsa031_u:1212: prayogasampattyā kāmacchando vyāpādaḥ styānamiddhamauddhatyakaukṛtyaṃ vicikitsā ceti pañcanīvaraṇairasaṃvāsaḥ,
SA14bsa031_u:1224: trimaṇḍalaviśuddhyā sarvāsu caryāsu buddhānumoditatvamiti eva ākāraḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:1225: yathākramaṃ ūṣmamūrdhakṣāntyagradharmeṣvavasthito bodhisattvo 'nuttarabodherna nivartata iti ebhirviṃśatiliṅgairvijñeyam /
SA14bsa031_u:1227: kṣāntijñānakṣaṇāḥ ṣaṭ ca pañca pañca ca dṛkpathe /
SA14bsa031_u:1229: iti / duḥkhādisatyadvārā dharmānvayajñānakṣāntyādayaḥ ṣoḍaśa kṣaṇāḥ darśanamārgasthabodhisattvasyāvaivartikalakṣaṇaṃ bhavati /
SA14bsa031_u:1236: samare matsarādau ca neti yogānuyogayoḥ // Abhis_4.49 //
SA14bsa031_u:1244: dharmapravicayasāmarthyād dhyānārūpyasamāpattyādyudayāṅgaparikṣaya iti catvāra eva duḥkhasyākārā bhavanti /
SA14bsa031_u:1248: satpuruṣadharmatayā samyagupakaraṇājīvaviśuddhatvamiti catvāra eva samudayākārā bhavanti /
SA14bsa031_u:1256: ekāntaniṣṭhatvena sarvākārajñatādidharmārthaṃ jīvitatyāga iti catvāro mārgākārā bhavanti /
SA14bsa031_u:1258: adhigamānurūpa eva sarvatra yogināṃ vyavahāraḥ anyatra sattvavinayaprayojanavaśāditi jñāpanāyopacāreṇoktam,
SA14bsa031_u:1260: tadanantaraṃ satyapi bhāvanāmārgasthāvaivartikalakṣaṇe 'nāgṛhītaviśeṣaṇā viśeṣye buddhirutpadyate ' iti nyāyāt tāvadbhāvanāmārgaṃ viśeṣayannāha -
SA14bsa031_u:1265: sā śūnyatādergāmbhīryaṃ śūnyatādikamiti gāmbhīryayogād gambhīro 'bhyāsapatha iti /
SA14bsa031_u:1268: nirvedhāṅgeṣu dṛṅmārge bhāvanāmārga eva ca // Abhis_4.53 //
SA14bsa031_u:1269_0: iti / śrutacintābhāvanāmayaprajñayā samādhau vā prayogamaulapṛṣṭhabhāvinyā prajñayā
SA14bsa031_u:1269_1: yathākramaṃ triṣu nirvedhāṅgādiṣu nirdiṣṭānāmarthānāṃ punaḥ punaścintātulananidhyānāni
SA14bsa031_u:1273_0: iti / vikalpakleśā bodhisattvā iti kṛtvā yathaudārikañca tamaḥ sūkṣmeṇālokena hanyate
SA14bsa031_u:1273_2: teṣāṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātrapratipakṣāṇāṃ pratyekaṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātrabhedāt tathā paramārthataḥ
SA14bsa031_u:1274: tattajjinajananīnāmekaikaṃ prakāramadhikṛtya asaṃkhyeyāprameyāpramāṇapuṇyaprasavavacanād bahudhā bhedāt kathaṃ navaprakāra iti cedāha -
SA14bsa031_u:1277_1: ekasminnarthe pratyuktāstasmāt paramārthena yathoktalakṣaṇasya bhāvanāmārgasya bhedaṃ kartuṃ na kṣamāḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:1279: śūnyatālakṣaṇatayā atiśayādhānābhāvād kiñcidapi mandabuddhipuruṣaṃ prati na kriyata eveti āśaṅkyāha -
SA14bsa031_u:1281: bhāvanākhyena kiṃ hīnaṃ vartmanā kimudāgatam // Abhis_4.56 //
SA14bsa031_u:1282: dharmatāsvarūpasya abhimatamārgavastuno niḥsvabhāvatayā tattvānyatvobhayānubhayatvairavācyasya bhāvanātiśayādhānābhāvāt vipakṣapratipakṣayoryathākramamapagamodayau na yujyete /
SA14bsa031_u:1283: yadyevaṃ bhāvanāsaṃjñakena mārgeṇa kiṃ vipakṣasvarūpaṃ parityaktam,
SA14bsa031_u:1289: tathatālakṣaṇā bodhiḥ so 'pi tallakṣaṇo mataḥ // Abhis_4.57 //
SA14bsa031_u:1291: tadvadayamapyāgantukamalāpagamād bhāvanayā sākṣātkṛto mārgaḥ tathatālakṣaṇo 'pi saṃvṛtyābhimatārthakriyākārī /
SA14bsa031_u:1292: paramārthatastu hānivṛddhyabhāva evāṅgīkriyata iti aprayoga eva prayogatvāt na doṣaḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:1293: evaṃ sati saṃvṛtyā arthakriyāsāmarthyaṃ na ghaṭata ityāśaṅkayannāha -
SA14bsa031_u:1294: pūrveṇa bodhirno yuktā manasā paścimena vā /
SA14bsa031_u:1304: tathaiva dvitīyakṣaṇe 'pi viśiṣṭajvālāvartyorūtpattikṣaṇe prathamakṣaṇamantareṇa nityasattvādiprasaṅgatayā saṃvṛtyutpādābhāvāt kāryakāraṇalakṣaṇadāhyadāhakābhāvaḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:1306: tadā nirhetukavināśe 'pi kāraṇakāryayoḥ yathākramaṃ tulyakālaniranvayavināśodayād dāhyadāhakabhāvaḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:1307: tasmāt prathamakṣaṇe dvitīyārciranapekṣya vartī na dahyate,
SA14bsa031_u:1308_0: dvitīyakṣaṇenāpi prathamārciranapekṣya vartī na dahyata iti dīpadṛṣṭāntanyāyena pūrvāparībhūtakṣaṇayorekaviṣayopayogajñāpanapareṇa
SA14bsa031_u:1309_0: yathoktenaiva ca dṛṣṭāntena aṣṭaprakārā gambhīradharmatā pratisartavyā iti bhāvanāmārgasthabodhisattvānāmavaivartikalakṣaṇakathanāya
SA14bsa031_u:1310: utpāde ca nirodhe ca tathatāyāṃ gabhīratā /
SA14bsa031_u:1312: iti / na pūrvāparakṣaṇābhyāṃ na ca niḥsvabhāvatayā bhāvanāgamyaviśiṣṭārthotpādanamiti pratītyasamutpādaḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:1313: sarvabhāvodaya eva niḥsvabhāva iti saṃvṛtyā nirudhyata iti nirodhaḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:1327: iti / vipakṣapratipakṣasāṃsārikavaiyadānikadharmāṇāṃ pratibhāsamātrasvabhāvasvapnasadṛśatvena avagamāt saṃsāranirvāṇayornānātvena avikalpa iti samatā /
SA14bsa031_u:1328: nanu svapnasadṛśatve sati daśākuśaladānādīnāmabhāvaḥ svapnāvasthāyāmiva jāgraddaśāyāmapi syāditicodyānāṃ parihārā bāhyārthavādanaye kṣaṇikatayā nirhetukavināśe
SA14bsa031_u:1330_0: iti siddhāntāt paramārthato na kaścinna kenaciddhato nāpi kayacid dravyaṃ kenacid
SA14bsa031_u:1331: tathaiva svapnasadṛśe vastuni tadanurūpārthe bhāvādyabhiniveśena akhaṇḍitasakalaviparyāsabandhanānāmityevaṃ tatpatihārāḥ tatpakṣāścānyatra abhihitā ityavagantavyāḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:1334: ityeva svapne 'pyupacittakuśalākuśalasya prabuddhāvasthāyāmaho kṛtaḥ sukṛta ityanumodane pṛṣṭhāvasthācittābhiniveśaparipuṣṭyā paripoṣaḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:1337: ubhayasamatāvibhāvanayā svabuddhakṣetre buddho bhaviṣyatīti tadanantaraṃ buddhakṣetrapariśuddhirityāha -
SA14bsa031_u:1357: sarvaviṣayajñānatvena apramāṇamiti prajñāpāramitāyā daśavidhaviṣayāṇāṃ sākṣātkriyāyāṃ kālākālajñānaprayoga eva upāyakauśalaṃ bhavatīti /
SA14bsa031_u:1362: prāptasarvākārabhisambodhasya prakarṣaparyanto 'dhigamo bhavatīti tatsukhāvabodhāya liṅgādyabhidhānapuraḥsaraṃ mūrdhābhisamayamāha -
SA14bsa031_u:1364: mūrdhaprāptasya yogasya liṅgaṃ dvādaśadhā matam // Abhis_5.1 //
SA14bsa031_u:1380: upamāṃ bahudhā kṛtvā vivṛddhiḥ ṣoḍaśātmikā // Abhis_5.2 //
SA14bsa031_u:1397: puṣpādibhiḥ buddhapūjāyāḥ śubhādikāṃ bahudhā upamāṃ kṛtvā uttarottaraviśeṣotkarṣeṇa ṣoḍaśāvasthātmikā vivṛddhirbhavati /
SA14bsa031_u:1407_0: iti / sambhavatpramāṇasya palapramāṇena parimāṇaṃ pramātuṃ śakyata iti nyāyāt caturdvīpāditrisāhasralokadhātūnāṃ
SA14bsa031_u:1407_1: sarveṣāṃ pāramitādīnāṃ samādhipuṇyajñānasvarūpāṇāṃ pṛthak pṛthak upamāṃ kṛtvā tebhyo
SA14bsa031_u:1413: pravṛtau ca nivṛtau ca pratyekaṃ tau navātmakau /
SA14bsa031_u:1415_1: dharmasyādānasantyāgākāreṇa grāhyāviti kleśavad vipakṣau grāhyavikalpau vastunyapratibaddhavṛttitvena
SA14bsa031_u:1419: grāhau cenna tathā sto 'rthau kasya tau grāhakau matau /
SA14bsa031_u:1421: iti / pṛthagjanāryapudgalayoryathākramaṃ dravyaprajñaptisatpuruṣādhiṣṭhānau grāhakavikalpau vibandhakatvād vipakṣau viṣayabhedena pratyekaṃ navaprakārāviti /
SA14bsa031_u:1422: yadā viṣayabhāvāpannagrāhyāvarthau na tathā grāhyarūpeṇa bhavatastadā na kasyacit tau grāhakāviti,
SA14bsa031_u:1424: kathaṃ pravṛtyadhiṣṭhānaḥ prathamo grāhyavikalpo navadhāḥ? ityāha -
SA14bsa031_u:1437: samyagupāyakauśalabalena sarvajananirvāṇapratiṣṭhāpanakriyāphale ca nirdoṣatayā upādeyatvena pravṛttiḥ kāryā,
SA14bsa031_u:1438: ityevaṃ pravṛttipakṣādhiṣṭhānaḥ prathamo grāhyavikalpo navaprakāro darśanamārgaprayogāvasthāyāṃ praheyo mata iti /
SA14bsa031_u:1439: kathaṃ nivṛttipakṣadhiṣṭhāno dvitīyo grāhyavikalpo navadheti? āha -
SA14bsa031_u:1454: mahāyānasarvasaṃgrāhakatvena sarvākārajñatāsarvanirvāṇapaścādanugamane ca sadoṣatayā grāhyatvena vinivṛttiḥ kāryā /
SA14bsa031_u:1455_1: navadhā bodhisattvānāṃ darśanamārge cittacaittapravṛttyavasthāyāṃ praheyo mata iti /
SA14bsa031_u:1456: kathaṃ dravyasatpṛthagjanapuruṣādhiṣṭhānaḥ prathamo grāhakavikalpo navadhā? ityāha -
SA14bsa031_u:1460: saktau ca pratipakṣe ca yathecchaṃ ca gatikṣatau // Abhis_5.14 //
SA14bsa031_u:1469: samyagavijñātaprajñāpāramitatvena yathecchagamanavyāghāte ca pāramārthikabhāvābhiniveśena prathamo grāhakavikalpo navaprakāro darśanamārgaprayogāvasthāyāṃ praheyo mata iti /
SA14bsa031_u:1470: kathaṃ prajñaptisatpuruṣādhiṣṭhāno dvitīyo grāhakavikalpo navadhā? ityāha -
SA14bsa031_u:1483_1: dvitīyo grāhakavikalpo navaprakāro darśanamārgacittacaittapravṛttyavasthāyāṃ praheyo mata iti /
SA14bsa031_u:1484: darśanamārge vipakṣaṃ sapratipakṣamevaṃ nirdiśya yanmahābodhiniṣpattaye darśanamārgo yena kāraṇena sahita iṣyate,
SA14bsa031_u:1488: iti / vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇabodhau darśanādimārgasandarśanena anyeṣāṃ pratiṣṭhāpanaṃ prathamam (kāraṇam) /
SA14bsa031_u:1491: kā punariyaṃ mahābodhiryadarthaṃ yathoktakāraṇasahāyo darśanamārgo 'bhipreta ityantaraślokena mahābodhimāha -
SA14bsa031_u:1496_1: gaganakamalavadvā yathākramaṃ malānāṃ kṣayotpādābhāvād akṣayānutpādajñānātmikā sarvadharmāviparītādhigatilakṣaṇā
SA14bsa031_u:1497: yasmādevaṃ ato ye bhāvavināśābhisandhinā kṣīṇe kṣīṇamiti jñānaṃ kṣayajñānam,
SA14bsa031_u:1500: teṣāṃ kṣayānutpādavaikalyād etajjñānaṃ na ghaṭata ityantaraślokenāha -
SA14bsa031_u:1502: vikalpajātaṃ ki kṣīṇaṃ kiṃ vānutpattimāgatam // Abhis_5.19 //
SA14bsa031_u:1503: iti / utpannānutpannayorthathākramaṃ kṣayotpattivighātalakṣaṇanirodhena aniruddhāyāṃ paramārthatastathatārūpāyāṃ prakṛtau satyāṃ katarad vikalpādirūpamutpannaṃ kṣīṇaṃ,
SA14bsa031_u:1504: kataraccānutpannam anutpattidharmakaṃ jātaṃ darśanamārgabalena vitathabhāvābhiniveśināṃ bhavatām?
SA14bsa031_u:1507: anyathā tāttvikadharmasattvopagame bhagavataḥ sarvathā vikalpakleśajñeyāvaraṇaprahāṇaṃ mahadvismayasthānīyaṃ syādityantaraślokenāha -
SA14bsa031_u:1508: sattvā ca nāma dharmāṇāṃ jñeye cāvaraṇakṣayaḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:1509: kathyate yatparaiḥ śāsturatra vismīyate mayā // Abhis_5.20 //
SA14bsa031_u:1510_3: bāhyārthābhiniveśaṃ tiraskṛtya grāhyābhāve grāhakābhāva iti nidhyāyaṃstāmapi grāhakākāralakṣaṇāṃ
SA14bsa031_u:1510_4: vijñaptimātratāmavadhūya advayajñānameva kevalaṃ bhāvato bhāvarūpamiti niścitya tadapi
SA14bsa031_u:1510_7: māyopamātmapratibhāsadhiyo nirvikalpāyāḥ kathañcit pratyātmavedyāyāḥ samutpāde jñeyāvaraṇaṃ
SA14bsa031_u:1511_0: anyathā paraiḥ sarvadā ākāśasya dravyābhāvamātrarūpadhāraṇavad anādheyānapaneyasvarūpadhāraṇād
SA14bsa031_u:1511_1: dharmāṇāṃ kṣaṇikānāṃ jñānamātrarūpāṇāṃ jñeyalakṣaṇānāñca yadi paramārthato vidyamānatā
SA14bsa031_u:1511_2: syāt tadā pratipakṣabhāvanayā ākāśasyeva teṣāṃ na kiñcit kriyate /
SA14bsa031_u:1512: ato bhāvābhiniveśaviparyāsāvinivṛtyā yad bhagavataḥ sarvathāḥ jñeyāvaraṇaprahāṇaṃ dharmāṇāñca yatsattopagamyate paraiḥ tatparasparaviruddhārthābhyupagame vismayasthānīyaṃ bhavet /
SA14bsa031_u:1515: draṣṭavyaṃ bhūtato bhūtaṃ bhūtadarśī vimucyate // Abhis_5.21 //
SA14bsa031_u:1516_1: kasyaciddharmasyākṛtvā idameva pratītyasamutpannaṃ saṃvṛtyā tathyarūpaṃ rūpādiniḥsvabhāvādirūpato nirūpaṇīyam,
SA14bsa031_u:1517: evañca māyāgajena aparamāyāgajaparājayavad viparyāsanivṛtyā tatvadarśī vimucyata iti /
SA14bsa031_u:1519: ekaikasyaiva dānādai teṣāṃ yaḥ saṅgraho mithaḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:1521: iti / dānādiṣaṭpāramitānāṃ pratyekamekaikabhāve dānādau yaḥ parasparaṃ sarvapāramitāsaṅgrahaḥ,
SA14bsa031_u:1522: so 'traikakṣaṇiko mūrdhābhisamaye duḥkhadharmajñānakṣāntisaṃgṛhītaḥ trimaṇḍalaviśuddhiprabhāvitaḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadākāranirjāto darśanamārgaḥ /
SA14bsa031_u:1525: tatra vaśitvārthaṃ tāmeva punaḥ punarbhāvayatīti antaraślokenāha -
SA14bsa031_u:1528: iti / sa darśanamārgaprāpto yogī kleśajñeyāvaraṇabhayābhāvāt siṃhavijṛmbhitaṃ (nāma)
SA14bsa031_u:1529: samādhiṃ samāpadya uttarakālamavidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā ityādyanulomaṃ jarāmaraṇanirodho jātinirodhād ityādipratilomaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ nirūpayati /
SA14bsa031_u:1531: darśanamārgamevamabhidhāya vipakṣaprahāṇādikam ādhārapratipattipūrvakaṃ subodhamiti ādhāraṃ bhāvanāmārgamāha -
SA14bsa031_u:1536: iti / bodhisattvāḥ prathamadhyānamārabhya yāvannirodhaṃ gatvā tato nirodhamārabhya yāvat prathamadhyānamāgamya evamanulomapratiloma (krama)
SA14bsa031_u:1537: -dvayena caturdhyāna caturārūpyanirodhalakṣaṇā nava samāpattīrgatvā āgamya punaḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadya tato vyutthāya nirodham,
SA14bsa031_u:1539: tato vyutthāya anantarasamāpattimālambya kāmāvacaraṃ vijñānaṃ maryādārūpeṇāvasthāpya upāyakauśalyabalena vyutthāya tadeva vijñānamasamāhitamāmukhīkṛtya,
SA14bsa031_u:1540: tato nirodhaṃ tato 'samāhitaṃ tato nirodhamekaṃ parityajya naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ tato 'samāhim tato dvayaṃ parityajya ākiñcanyāyatanaṃ tato 'samāhitam,
SA14bsa031_u:1541: evaṃ yāvadaṣṭau parityajya prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ tato 'samāhitam,
